rules_text:
When Dawnhart Ceremony enters, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
[i]Invocation[/i] – When you spend four or more mana to cast a spell or activate an ability during your turn, transform Dawnhart Ceremony.
rules_text2: Dawnhart Scourge can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text2: [i]The witches thought they must have angered Ghrin-Danu, but the god was afraid of someone else.[/i]
